transcript:
Customer: Ji grahak ne tame call kari rahya chho te anya call par vyast chhe. Kripa karine chalu rakho athva farithi call karo. Aap jis vyakti ko call kar rahe hai.
Halo.
Executive: Ha keval sir swapnil baat kar raha hu India Mart se senior manager recording.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Ji abhi baat ho gayi aapki aapke account manager se anuj se.
Customer: Ha ho gayi ho gayi.
Executive: To meeting vagaira ke liye inhone bola hoga aapko kitne tarikh ko arrange kar kitne tarikh ko aap logo ne fix kiya hai.
Customer: Tuesday bol rahe hai wo.
Executive: Do tarikh ko.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Thik hai to do tarikh ko free rahiyega thik hai anuj 11 baje ka bol rahe the na ha thik hai to google meet pe ek bar meeting fix karke aur baki jo bhi chize hai wo aapko mai kya bol raha hu aisa matlab jaise meeting meeting nahi rakhni hai aap apne end se matlab kar dete to thoda thik rahega.
Executive: Nahi hum to kar denge matlab hai na non technical bande hai samajh gaya hum to kar denge lekin the thing is that agar hum kuch karte hai wo aapko pata bhi hona chahiye.
Customer: Nahi nahi humko pata nahi karna hai mere ko jo pata karna tha wo humne pata kar liya hai ki unhone jo aapke pass jo aadmi the na unhone bata diya ki ye jo naam vagaira hai na wo matlab galat matlab user friendly name nahi hai to aap matlab apna ye jo dashboard hai na wo matlab proper kar lo pehle.
Executive: Aisa bola inhone aapko abhi kya matlab meeting nahi karna hai aapko aisa bol rahe ho aap.
Customer: Nahi nahi meeting nahi karna hai kyuki meeting me matlab unko pata nahi chalega kya puch rahe ho aap kya batana hai wo sab itna.
Executive: Technical bande ki kya jarurat hai aapko to bas dekhna hai sir wo to discuss to anuj karenge na aap se jo bhi chize hongi correction karwane ko to mai karwa hi raha hu lekin mai bol raha hu aap laptop to baat karta hu call lete nahi aao to are unko ye sab nahi pata bhai ye laptop use karna bhi nahi aata unko aisa hai mai unka matlab colleague hu na to wo inse baat mai kar deta hu unka handle sab kuch.
Executive: Aap unke colleague baat kar rahe hai wahi to mai soch raha hu ki aisa boliye na sir tum log.
Customer: Ji thik thik hai mai samajh gaya category correction already maine kar diya tha last time thik hai meeting ke liye mai isliye bol raha tha ki agar wo usme aayenge to at least dekh to payenge ki ha lead kaise bahar aa raha hai kya kya galat aa raha hai.
Executive: Usme matlab dikkat kya hai ki unko matlab hai na hindi me matlab itni jyada nahi aati baat karne barabar aur ye jo matlab aap jo bataoge na ki ye login karo wo sab matlab samajhne nahi aayega.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Isliye humko kya chahiye barabar abhi hamare main requirement ye hai ki hamare jo lead aa rahi hai na wo matlab galat aa rahi hai wo aap matlab thode relevant kar lo ki jo hamari jo product hai na uske relevant aap apne end se jo karna hai wo kar dijiye barabar hai matlab humko koi jarurat nahi lag rahi hai.
Executive: Relevancy to sir thik kar diya tha maine abhi bataiye kaun sa galat aa raha hai aap ek bar batayenge mere ko.
Customer: Matlab jo kitchen hum jo bech rahe hai na wo ye matlab cartoon wala.
Executive: Kar diya tha thik sir abhi jaise aapke pass jo buyer aaya hai agar mai dekhu abhi to aapne sare lead consume kar liye hai sir ek bhi lead nahi hai ye hai na 92 lead hai bhai.
Executive: Kya sir wo aisa nahi hai wahi to sir aapko pata nahi hai na jaise aapko hi nahi pata hai ab aap kya kar rahe hai jo no relevant buyleads ke niche wale jo leads hai wo dekh rahe hai wo aapke relevant thodi na hai sir.
Customer: To proper relevant kaun si sir aayega.
Executive: Aapke pass roj ka do se teen lead milti hai sir ek din me 10-10 lead nahi milti hai jaise aapne 10 lead consume kara hai na to 10 lead me aapne irrelevant leads consume kar liya hai jo aapke kam ki hi nahi hai sir wahi to mai aapko samjha raha hu sir isliye to mai training ke liye bol raha tha aap se to training me nahi karenge pata hi nahi rahega aap bas yahi bolenge irrelevant aa raha hai irrelevant nahi aa raha hai aap irrelevant wali consume kar rahe hai waha saaf saaf likha hua hai padhiye sir no relevant buyleads found showing other leads you may like waha se aap lead consume kar rahe hai.
Customer: Kidhar likha hai.
Executive: Buyleads ki baat kar raha hu buyleads me jab jayenge na no relevant buyleads found showing other leads you may to ye jitne bhi hai ye irrelevant hai sir wo koi problem thodi na wahi to sir mai bol raha tha aapko agar unko meeting aap hi kar lena meeting at least aapko to knowledge ho jayega aap bata to sakte hai unko ye chiz.
Customer: Sir aisa hai bhai ki mai idhar matlab idhar khamba se nahi rehta mai ahmedabad to aap matlab saturday sunday nahi rakh sakte meeting.
Executive: Abhi to sir dekhiye saturday to aaj bhi hai sunday kal.
Customer: Kya aaj abhi meeting kara de.
Executive: Ha thik hai mai aapko meeting karata hu join kar lijiyega.
Customer: Ha wo bol raha hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer receiving irrelevant buyleads.

- Customer doesn't want to attend meeting.

- Customer's colleague will handle the account.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about relevant and irrelevant buyleads.

- Executive agreed to schedule a meeting immediately.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will schedule a meeting for the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, meeting, relevancy, training
